text: Uron i porazheniye v blizhney zhizni i muchitel'noye nakazaniye v posleduyushchey zhizni - dlya togo, chtoby Allakh otdelil skvernykh, sovershayushchikh zlodeyaniya, govoryashchikh durnyye slova, ot lyudey s dobrymi dushami i serdtsami, sovershayushchikh dobrodeyaniya i govoryashchikh tol'ko dobryye slova, chtoby On sobral vsekh merzkikh odnogo za drugim, svalil ikh v odnu kuchu i pomestil v ad v Sudnyy den'. Eti greshniki, kotoryye ne uverovali v Allakha, budut v ubytke v blizhayshey zhizni i v budushchey
